trans-unit.target:
Each shop in Wachumeqimeqi has a list of requested deliveries. <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>XRral Soj Metalwares<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> will accept items from <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>blacksmiths<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>armorers<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, and <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>goldsmiths<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. The items requested will vary according to your level, and may be crafted by any of the corresponding classes. To begin the crafting process, select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Logs<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> from the main menu, followed by <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Crafting Log<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Next, select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Special Recipes<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> from within the requisite crafting discipline, then <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Class<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, and lastly <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Wachumeqimeqi<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> to locate the desired recipe. The esteem gauge will build with each successful delivery. Fill the gauge completely and your <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>esteem level<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> will increase, allowing you to progress through the story.
Wachumeqimeqi Deliveries take the form of collectables, and you are able to submit multiple items simultaneously. Items with a higher collectability do not result in a larger increase in esteem, but you will receive greater rewards upon delivery.

The items requested will vary according to your level, and may be crafted by any of the corresponding classes. To begin the crafting process, select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Logs<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> from the main menu, followed by <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Crafting Log<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Next, select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Special Recipes<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> from within the requisite crafting discipline, then <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Class<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, and lastly <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Wachumeqimeqi<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> to locate the desired recipe. The esteem gauge will build with each successful delivery. Fill the gauge completely and your <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>esteem level<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> will increase, allowing you to progress through the story.
Wachumeqimeqi Deliveries take the form of collectables, and you are able to submit multiple items simultaneously. Items with a higher collectability do not result in a larger increase in esteem, but you will receive greater rewards upon delivery.
